plugily.projects.villagedefense.creeperattack.arena

类 ArenaContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • plugily.projects.villagedefense.creeperattack.arena.ArenaContext

  • public class ArenaContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores all Creeper Attack specific data for an arena. This class centralizes game state to avoid polluting the base Arena class.

    • 构造器概要
